title: Businesses oppose Florida's 'Don't Say Gay' ban on discussion of LGBTQ issues in public schools - CNBC
content:
1. Businesses oppose Florida's 'Don't Say Gay' ban on discussion of LGBTQ issues in public schools  CNBC

description: The Florida measure rocketed to the forefront of national politics in recent months, drawing criticism from the LGBTQ community, Democrats and the White House.
